GSP32vvmanmhu:10: yatkarma tat prayatnādhārajaṃ yathā - sampratipannaṃ karma,
GSP32vvmanmhu:13: 2) vivādādhyāsitaṃ mūrtaṃ prayatnādhārajam, paramāṇuvyatiriktatve sati mūrtatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:19: etena vyāptidarśanakāle karmatvakāryatvāderaṅkaratajjananādau kevalasyāpi darśanād vyāptaniścaya iti parākṛtam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:21: yāvadupādhirna nirūpyate, tāvadekasminnapi piṇḍenayoḥ sambandhaniyame prayojakatvaṃ vācyam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:24: 4) kiṃ ca vivādhyāsite pṛthivyudake prayatnavatā ghṛte, gurutve satyapātitvāt karatalāmalakavat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:25: 5) īśvarajñānaṃ nityam, dviṣṭhavyatiriktatve sati īśvaraniṣṭhatvāt, tadgatamahatvavat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:27: tasyāpi sādhane bādhaḥ --- na hi draṣṭurddaṣṭerviparilopo vidyate (bṛha 4.3.23) ityāgamabādhaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:29: na ca tatrāpi kāraṇasadbhāva upādhiḥ, tasyāpi sādhanādbādhāyā abhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:33: bauddhaṃ prati īśvarasādhanam --- vivādādhyāsito vikalpaḥ tadatirikte pramā,
GSP32vvmanmhu:44: na cātraitadvyatiriktatvamupādhiḥ, tava vyarthaviśeṣaṇatvāt, mama nityeṣvapi sambhavāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:58: prakāśate vivādapadamiti nātra prakaraṇasamatvam, ubhayavādisiddhāśrayasya durnirūpatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:73: 1) vivādādhyāsito gandha etadgandhakāraṇena janyate gandhatvāt, kāryatvādetadvat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:74: na ca piṇḍasyevopādhitvam, tatsamānakṣaṇānāṃ rūpādīnāmapi tathābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:79: kalpanayā tatsiddhyabhyupagame vastuno 'sattvena tanmūlasya kāryakāraṇabhāvasyāsattvaprāptau viśvāsattvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:81: sahakāriṇāmeva hetutvamastviti (cenna) teṣāmeva caramatvaniyame tadupayogaḥ syāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:84: krameṇa kāryakaraṇārhaṃ sthiraṃ tadviparītaṃ kṣaṇikamiti vipratipatterviṣaya udghāṭanīyaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:93: na cātraupādhikaśaṅkā 'pyasti gandhatvasya, tasyābhāve 'pi gurutvādiṣu sādhyasya darśanāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:100: na ca vyarthaviśeṣaṇatvam, kāryatvamātrasya dhvaṃsādiṣu vyabhicārāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:101: 5) vivādādhyāsitaṃ kāryaṃ samavāyikāraṇakaṃ kāryatvāt, mahāmūrtatvādvāghaṭavaditi kecit /
GSP32vvmanmhu:104: tathā ca vyarthaviśeṣaṇatvam, prativādino vyāvṛttyabhāvāt, manasi vyabhicāraśca /
GSP32vvmanmhu:111: 1) vivādādhyāsitaṃ pṛthivīsamavāyikāraṇakam, kāryatve sati gandhatvāt, sampratipannavat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:112: na ca sopādhikatvaṃ syāt, mahāpṛthivītvasya rūpādau sādhyāvyāpakatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:117: nityatve sati gandhavān pārthivaḥ paramāṇuriti pārthivaparamāṇulakṣaṇam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:124: hiraṇyagarbhaḥ samavartatāgre bhūtasya jātaḥ patireka āsīt (ṛ saṃ 10.121.1) iti śruteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:136: tañca pūrvānumānena sādhayituṃ śakyate iti na kaścid doṣaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:144: 1) vivādādhyāsitāḥ paramāṇavaḥ paramparayā śarīrārambhakāḥ, rūpiparamāṇutvāt, pārthivaparamāṇuvat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:146: so 'gnerdevayonyā āhutibhyaḥ sambūya hiraṇyaśarīra ūrdhvaṃ svargalokametītyāgamabādhāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:153: vivādādhyāsitāḥ paramāṇavo na pārthivāḥ, atyantāgnisaṃyoge bhasmānārambhakatvāt, jalaparamāṇuvat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:165: mūrtatve sati tvagindriyānyatve ca sati vyāptyā tvagindriyasaṃyogādhāraḥ śarīram /
GSP32vvmanmhu:174: na codbhūtasparśābhāvo mahattve sati prayojakaḥ, vāristhite tejasi abhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:175: na ca tasyāpi pratyakṣatvam, uṣṇaṃ jalamiti vibhramānupapatteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:180: na ca mahattve satīti viśeṣaṇīyam, pratyakṣasāmagrīsadbhāvasyopādheḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:197: na ca sarvāvinābhāvānāmucchedaḥ, yatra vyatirekasya bhāvarūpatvaṃ tatraitaddoṣasyābhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:216: tasya tadādhāratvayogyatāṃ vihāya na kiñcidanyadasarvagatatvādatiricyate, tacca parimāṇaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:218: asarvagatatvasya rūpādiṣvapi saṃbhavāt, dravyatvena viśeṣaṇe viśeṣyavaiyarthyāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:219: sparśavattvasya prayojaktve manaso 'parimāṇatvaprasaṅgaḥ, manasi ca tadabhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:223: na ca sāvayatvamupādhiḥ, tasya maduktahetugarbhitatvād, dravyate sati ārabhyatvasya tattvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:228: upādhibhedācca bheda ityanarthabījam, ātmāntaḥkaraṇādīnāmapi tathābhāve virodhābhāvat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:239: na ca sādhye bahuvacanakṣepaṇātiprasaṅga iti vācyam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:241: na mano manasā saṃyujyate nityadravyatvāditi sādhane dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:244: tathā ca vyomaśivaḥ-- `parakīyena ca manasā sūkṣmaśarīrasthaṃ manaḥ maryāyeṇābhisambandhayati' /
GSP32vvmanmhu:246: na ca vimatipadaṃ viśeṣaguṇarahitadravyābhyāṃ na janyate,
GSP32vvmanmhu:254: tasya ca ko viṣaya iti cintāyāṃ paraśarīraparātmādiṣvatiprasaṅganirākaraṇārthaṃ yatra svayaṃ samavetaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:255: sa eva tasya viṣaya iti vaktavyamiti sthite ---
GSP32vvmanmhu:259: avasthāviśeṣavataḥ śarīrasya pakṣatvānna doṣaḥ, tathā śarīratvāt mṛtaśarīravaditi vācyam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:260: vivādādhyāsitaḥ prāṇo na jñānādhāraḥ, kāryatvādvāyutvāt, prāṇatvāt suṣuptāvasthaprāṇavat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:266: śarīrasya tu yogyānupalabdhyā bādha iti cet /
GSP32vvmanmhu:267: kiṃ cātaḥ? tasyaiva bodhādhāratvāttadabhāve bodhādhārasyāpi abhāva iti cet /
GSP32vvmanmhu:269: vyāptatvānnaivamiti cet, tarhyanumānena bādho vakyavyaḥ, tatra cāśrayanirūpaṇaṃ durghaṭam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:270: vivādādhyāsitaṃ bodhādhārajaṃ na bhavati, śarīrajanyatvādākāśavaditi prāgeva vyudastam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:273: tatrāpi suṣuptaśarīrakriyādiṣu vyabhicāraparihārāya jāgrata iti viśeṣaṇaprāpte,
GSP32vvmanmhu:282: anye tu sarvārthavittiṣu grāhakatvena ātmasiddhiriti bruvate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:283: tadasat, ātmano 'pi cākṣuṣatvaprasaṅgāt, tajjanitajñāne bhāsamānatvasyaiva tattvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:284: yadi ca nīrūpadravyasyāpi cākṣuṣatvam, tadā nabhaso 'pi tathātvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:289: tathā hi --- asti tāvat saugatatacchiṣyāṇāmanātmavāsanāto viṣayebhyo nivṛtiḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:291: na ca te pramāṇamūle eveti niyamaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:293: na ca te na nivṛttī, nāpi pravṛttī vā /
GSP32vvmanmhu:294: na cājñānupūrvikā nivṛttiḥ pravṛttirvā svasthasya saṃbhavati /
GSP32vvmanmhu:295: na cātmajñāne teṣāṃ tadupapadyate, tathānabhyāsadaśāyāṃ ko 'hamitya(dhyavasāyānupapattirniścīyate)
GSP32vvmanmhu:303: kiṃ ca yogināṃ viyuktāvasthāyāṃ paramāṇurūpādiviṣayacākṣuṣajñānasya pakṣīkāre bhavatāmāśrayaikadeśāsiddhaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:305: na ca mānasapratyakṣatve tatsāmagrayāḥ sarvadā sannihitatvāt suṣuptāvasthāyāmapyātmajñānaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:306: ahaṃ śarīramitivivekāgrahaṇādiṣu ahaṃjñānotpattau bāhyendriyavyatiriktakārakagrāmasyaiva tvayāpi vaktavyatvāttadbalenaiva sarvasyopapatteḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:311: sa ca jñānāśrayo na tu vijñānātmakaḥ, na hi draṣṭurdṛṣṭerviparilopo vidyate (bṛha 4.3.23)
GSP32vvmanmhu:316: na ca rāhoḥ śira itivadupacaritatvam, mukhye bādhakābhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:317: na cādvaitaśrutirbādhikā, viparyaye pratyuta tasya bhedagrāhakatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:318: na ca tatra tasya sāmarthyaṃ nāstīti vācyam, sāmarthye sati virodhābhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:323: tathā hi -- ghaṭasaṃyuktena cakṣuṣā janitaṃ jñānaṃ ghaṭamevāvagāhate nārthāntaram, asambaddhatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:324: kiñcāsti tāvadiyaṃ prasiddhiḥ, 'ata eva vyavaharāmaḥ' itivacanāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:329: na ca bhedānavasthā bādhikā, bhedāntaraprasaktau mūlābhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:332: so 'yaṃ piṇyākayācanārthaṃ gatasyāpi śākādinaḥ khārikātailadātṛtvābhyupagama iva /
GSP32vvmanmhu:333: dṛṣṭāntabhedavighāte tvanumānānutthānameva, upajīvyasya prabalatvena tenaiva bādhāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:356: na cārdvatapakṣe satyajñānānandādiśabdānāṃ sahaprayogo ghaṭate, paryāyatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:358: na ca `prakṛṣṭaḥ prakāśaḥ savitā' itivat śabdadvayenāpi eka evārthaḥ pratipādyate iti yuktam, dṛṣṭāntāsiddheḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:362: kiṃ ca loke yathā prakṛṣṭaprakāśaśabdayoḥ parasparavyatirekeṇa prayogaḥ --- prakṛṣṭaḥ pumān,
GSP32vvmanmhu:368: mukhye bādhakasambhavāt --- 'aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ' (chā u 8.12.1) iti vacanāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:371: na cātrāvacchinnasukhaniṣedhārtham, tatrāpyavacchedasyaiva niṣedho na sukhasya /
GSP32vvmanmhu:374: na ca viparyayaḥ, ānandasya sarvadā-adarśanenānityatvaprāptau mokṣatvavyāghātāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:376: anantatvādiśrutistu āpekṣikasukhādyapekṣayā bahukālatvena vyākhyeyā, 'amṛtā devā' itivat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:378: na hi siddhasya sampādanāya kaścid yatate 'tra /
GSP32vvmanmhu:382: na caikanityasukhavāde kāraṇopādānaṃ ghaṭate, tadviśeṣe tu kaiva kathā?
GSP32vvmanmhu:386: tadanupapattiriti yo 'yaṃ doṣa uktaḥ, sa samānaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:388: na ca tathāvidhasya muktau kathāsambhava iti /
GSP32vvmanmhu:397: vivādādhyāsitaṃ mayā sambaddhaṃ mūrtatvāt, maccharīravad -- iti nityatvānāditvasarvagatatvasiddhiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:400: dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ vṛkṣaṃ pariṣasvajāte /
GSP32vvmanmhu:403: asyā arthaḥ -- dvau suparṇau ātmānau sayujau = sahavartamānau sakhāyau = ekakāryakāritvena,
GSP32vvmanmhu:404: samānaṃ vṛkṣam = ekaṃ śarīraṃ pariṣasvajāte = āliṅgitavantau /
GSP32vvmanmhu:405: tayorātmanormadhye eko = bhoktā pippalaṃ svādu atti = sukhaviśeṣaṃ bhuṅkte /
GSP32vvmanmhu:406: anaśnan anyaḥ = abhoktā īśvaraḥ abhicākaśīti = sarvato 'tyarthaṃ prakāśate iti vispaṣṭo jīvabrahmaṇorbhedaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:407: ajāmekāṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ bahvīḥ prajāḥ sṛjamānāṃ sarūpāḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:412: iti, `mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti, ya iha nāneva paśyati' (kaṭha 4.10)
GSP32vvmanmhu:415: na ca sati prayojane nimitte copacāraḥ pravartate, na cātra prayojanamastīti vācyam, niyamāsiddheḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:425: vṛddhavyavahārāgateṣu gauṇaprayogeṣu ko 'yamāgrahaḥ, yathā sarṣaparase tailaśabdaḥ?
GSP32vvmanmhu:426: mukhyeṣu bādhakābhāvāt kathamupacāra iti nāśaṅkanīyam, pratyakṣeṇa śrutyā ca bhedapratīteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:428: tatra na mūrtatvamupādhiḥ, rūpādau tadabhāve 'pi sādhyānugamadarśanāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:429: makarandastu vivādapadāni śarīrāṇi, ekenātmanātmavanti, śarīratvāt, maccharīravaditi /
GSP32vvmanmhu:443: manaḥ paramāṇu, paraviśeṣaguṇāsamavāyikāraṇāśrayatve sati nityatvāt, taijasaparamāṇuvaditi kecit /
GSP32vvmanmhu:449: etena mano mūrtaṃ vibhusaṃyogitvādghaṭavadityapi nirastam, uktopādhikatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:456: etenāvibhu nityadravyatvādityanenāmahattvasādhane sādhyavyāpakatvāt sparśavattvaṃ nopādhiriti śrīvallabhoktaṃ nirastam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:490: nīlaṃ tama iti pratītiḥ pramāṇamiti cet, nīlabuddhyasiddheḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:491: uktaṃ ca śālikanāthenāpi-- apratītāvevāyaṃ pratītibhramo mandānām' (pra paṃ 321) iti /
GSP32vvmanmhu:497: kathaṃ tarhi chāyāyāṃ kṛṣṇasarpabhrama iti cet, doṣavaśāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:511: yathāhuḥ --- añjanapuñja iva śārvaraṃ tama iti bhrāntiprakaraṇe tatra pratibhāsikabādhānupapatteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:514: tamaḥ śabdasya tarhi ko 'rtha iti cet, ubhayavādipratipanna ālokasaṃsargābhāvaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:515: ālokaviśeṣe satyapi ālokāntarābhāvasyāpi sambhavāt prayogaprasaṅga iti cet,
GSP32vvmanmhu:517: asti cet, tamaḥśabdaprayogo 'pyastu, kā no hāniḥ? paryāyaśabdatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:518: atha yathā jvālāyā āśutaravināśitvena madhye vināśe vidyamāne 'pi tatsadṛśajvālotpattyā tirohitatvānna nāśavyavahāraḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:521: tattulyaṃ te tarkakarkaśamaterapyuktaparihāraścakṣurālokāsahakṛtaṃ rūpigrāhakaṃ dravyagrāhakendriyatvāttvagvaditi vādinaḥ kālagrāhakaghrāṇenānaikāntikaṃ vyarthaviśeṣaṇatā ca /
GSP32vvmanmhu:523: indriyatvāditi sādhane ghrāṇena prativādinānaikāntikatā vivakṣitā---sādhakatvaṃ ca /
GSP32vvmanmhu:524: na hi tava tathāvidhaṃ tama eveti lakṣaṇaṃ kālāderapi ālokanirapekṣendriyagrāhyatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:526: ālokabhāvasyobhayavādisampratipannatvāt tamaḥśabdavācyatve nāsti vipratipattirnātra prakaraṇaṃ vācyam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:528: yaditthaṃ na bhavati, taditthamapi na bhavati, yathāloka eva /
GSP32vvmanmhu:567: etena śuklaṃ rūpamekameveti nirastam, taratamabhāvasyāpi dṛṣṭeḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:568: 10) nityatve satyanekārthe vartamānatvātsāmānyamityuktaṃ syāt, tasya ca yāvaddravyabhāvitvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:571: guṇatve sati cakṣuḥsparśanayormadhye cakṣuṣaiva grahaṇārhaṃ rūpam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:582: na ca sparśavattvamupādhiḥ, sparśavatāṃ ghaṭādīnāmapi tathāvidhaguṇadvayāśrayatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:592: 4) vipratipanno 'vayavī kāraṇatvārheṇa saha tulyāśrayaḥ, avayavitvād, dvyaṇukavad dvitantukavacca /
GSP32vvmanmhu:601: asti ca tāvadekaṃ dve trīṇi ityādivyavahāraḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:603: na cābheda ekatvaṃ bhedasamuccayaḥ punaranekatvamiti yuktam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:604: abhedaḥ kiṃ paṭastadatirikto vā? ādye (ekaḥ paṭa iti) sahaprayogānupapattiḥ, paryāyatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:606: guṇādāvabhedavyavahāra iti cenna, vyavahāramātrādarthāsiddheḥ, tasya gauṇasyāpi bahuśo darśanāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:607: mukhye bādhakābhāvāt, kathaṃ gauṇatvamiti cet, na; sādhakasyāpyabhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:614: tathāpyananusaṃhitavaijātyādīnāṃ bālagopālādīnāṃ dvāviti vyavahāro 'yaṃ na tannibandhanaḥ dvyaṇukaparimāṇaṃ dvitvasaṃkhyayā vinā na ghaṭate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:624: teṣāṃ jñānaprāgabhāvena vyabhicāraḥ --- guṇatve satīti viśeṣaṇe īśvarecchāyām,
GSP32vvmanmhu:634: na ca sparśavattvamūrtatve upādhī, pavanapārthivaparamāṇau vyabhicārāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:637: adviṣṭha iti dviṣṭhaguṇatvāvāntarajātirahita iti boddhavyam, anyathā ekatvena siddhasādhanatā /
GSP32vvmanmhu:638: 2) tathā vyavahāreṇāpi sādhanīyam --- asti tāvadayaṃ mahān, ayaṃ mahāniti vyavahāraḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:651: na ca pradhvaṃse vyabhicāraḥ, prāgabhāvapratiyogitvasya bhāvatve satīti viśeṣitasya tatrāsiddheḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:652: na cātropādhiśaṅkāpyadhirohati, vispaṣṭaśca ghaṭau saṃyuktāviti pratyayaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:669: asamavāyikāraṇatve satīti viśeṣaṇe kevalasaṃyogārambhakeṇa saṃyogena vyabhicārāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:671: na ca saṃyogavyatiriktāsamavāyikāraṇatvāditi saṃyogasyaivāsamavāyikāraṇatvaṃ pratīyate iti bādhitaviṣayatvam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:673: na caivaṃ prathamānumāne siddhasādhyatā, mandagatau tadabhāvāt vyatiriktāsiddheḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:678: na ca saṃyogābhāvo nimittam, saṃyoganāśe eva kāraṇabhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:679: na ca karmaṇaḥ tatra kāraṇatvam, guṇānāṃ karmavināśyatvādarśanāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:681: na ca vibhāgavināśyo 'pi na bhavati, tasmādeveti sāmpratam, pratiyogyasiddhyā vyāptyasiddheḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:691: tadasat, ākāśadeśena vibhāgamārabhate karmatvādityapi vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:695: uttarasaṃyogādvināśaḥ paścādapi kathaṃ vibhāgapratyayānuvṛtterapi na vācyam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:699: saṃyogasaṃsargābhāve vibhāgapadasyāpi na pṛthak saṃketaḥ, saṃyogaprāgabhāve 'pi vyavahāradarśanāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:706: vivādapadaṃ svārabdhadravye guṇajanakam, dravyatve sati dravyārambhakatvādīśvaravat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:725: prabhākaramate vivādapadaṃ na mānasapratyakṣaṃ jñānatvāditi na sāmpratam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:728: na ca ghaṭaṃ jānāmītyatra kalpanālāghavādekameva jñānaṃ kalpanīyam --- ityarthāpattyupanyāso doṣaḥ syāt,
GSP32vvmanmhu:735: na ca jñānaṃ mānasapratyakṣaṃ na bhavati, jñānatvāditi sāmpratam, asādhāraṇatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:739: atha kecidakhyātiṃ samarthayanti, vivādapadaṃ rajataviṣayaṃ rajatajñānatvāditi bruvate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:740: te tu praṣṭavyāḥ--- kimidaṃ rajatajñānaṃ nāma?
GSP32vvmanmhu:750: na caturthaḥ, vivekāgrahaṇavādināmidamiti jñānasyāpi śuktikālambanasya taddhetutvena vyabhicārāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:752: yacca vimataṃ jñānaṃ yathārthaṃ jñānatvāditi bruvate,
GSP32vvmanmhu:758: bālakasya svātmani vivekāgrahaṇamātrātpravṛttiṃ paśyata uttamavṛddhavākyaprayogānantaraṃ pravarttamānamadhyamavṛddhapravṛtterapi tanmātrapūrvakatvakalpanāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:774: tena cāsmaduktāvāntarabhedasyābhyupagatatvādbhāsarvajñena sahāsmākaṃ nāsti vipratipattiriti nātra prapañcyate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:788: ātmā jñātavya iti vākyaprasiddho yogajo dharmaḥ sarvadarśitvādiphalakaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:792: yadāha bhagavān svayameva-- `śucīnāṃ śrīmatāṃ gehe yogabhraṣṭo 'bhijāyate' (gī 6.11) iti /
GSP32vvmanmhu:798: (4.1 syādetat --) anumitau kiṃ pramāṇamiti cet, pratyakṣamiti brūmaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:799: bhavati hi vahnimān parvata iti jñānamiti hi dūradeśasthasya kasyāpi matiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:800: tathāpi tena tasyānumititvaṃ kathamavagamyate iti mā vocaḥ, pratyakṣatve' pi samānatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:804: tatsiddhau cānena pramāṇenānvayavyatirekāparanāmnā pratyakṣasāmagrīpraviṣṭenānyena vā siddhiriti yatkiñcidetat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:812: yena vinā yayoḥ sahabhāvādarśanaṃ tatra yena yasya vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:814: dṛṣṭāntamātravyāpako vā, sādhanavyāpakatve sati sādhyavyāpako vā /
GSP32vvmanmhu:824: vyatirekiṇi tu tadabhāvasya sādhanatvenopayoge tasya vyavacchedakatve nopayoga iti viśeṣaṇavaiyarthyam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:838: siddhasādhyatāyāśca parihārārthamāśrayajñānasya ca prathamamākāṃkṣitatvāt prathamataḥ pratijñāvacanam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:840: kāraṇamātrasiddhau viśeṣe jijñāsāyāṃ satyāmākāṃkṣāparyālocanayā hetumātrasyaiva vacanam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:853: anyathā hetumātrameva prayoktavyaṃ syād, viduṣāṃ viśiṣṭārthasyārthādeva pratīteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:856: prativādinā hi sādhanajijñāsā kṛtā kiṃ pramāṇamiti /
GSP32vvmanmhu:862: sambhave vā vastuno dvyātmakatvaṃ ko nivārayet?
GSP32vvmanmhu:867: tasmādyatkāryam, tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ, kāryaśca śabda ityanvayini /
GSP32vvmanmhu:868: yannityam, tadakāryaṃ yathā vyoma, kāryaśca śabda iti vyatirekiṇi /
GSP32vvmanmhu:870: anvayavyatirekītyaparo neṣyate, ekenaivānumitisiddhau samuditasya hetutve pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:876: pakṣavipakṣayoreva vartamāno heturviruddhaḥ, nityaḥ śabdaḥ kāryatvāditi /
GSP32vvmanmhu:880: yenānaupādhikatve samarthaṃ syādato viśiṣṭaṃ na dūṣaṇamiti cet /
GSP32vvmanmhu:882: jalpavādayorhi parasādhanaṃ nivartya svapakṣe sādhanaṃ vācyam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:885: vitaṇḍāyāṃ tu vipakṣavṛttitā paramudbhāvyā, anumityutpattipratibandhakatvaṃ ca dūṣaṇam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:888: sa kaḥ? anityaḥ śabdaḥ, prameyatvāditi niścitaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:889: mano vibhu, sarvadā sparśarahitadravyatvāditi śaṅkitaḥ, sopādhikatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:894: na hi kālātyayāpadiṣṭānaikāntikatvaṃ nāma samuditamasti dūṣaṇam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:896: ārṣasadbhāve kiṃ pramāṇamiti cet, pratyakṣamiti brumaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:899: na caitadatiriktaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ nāma yat sādhanīyamavaśiṣyate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:903_1: yathārthasya kriyākāritvena bādhitaviṣayatvādanumānasyaiva durbalatvamiti cet, samaḥ samādhiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:911: kathaṃ punarasyāḥ parokṣatvamiti cet, anumiterapi parokṣatā katham?
GSP32vvmanmhu:925: ayameva ca bhāṣyakartturabhiprāya, anyathā pramāṇamadhye tatpaṭhanamasaṅgataṃ syāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:930: nanu tato 'tiriktānyapi śabdādīni santīti cet, na aprasiddheḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:931: nadyāstīre pañca phalāni santīti vākyādarthapratyayo jāyate iti cet,
GSP32vvmanmhu:932: atra kasya kāraṇatvamiti vibhāvyatām--- na pratyakṣasya,
GSP32vvmanmhu:935: na hi nadyāstīre pañca phalāni santīti vākyena nadītīraphalasambandhasyāvyabhicaritaḥ sambandhaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:937: āptatve satīti viśeṣaṇe pūrvamarthasiddherasiddho vākyārthaḥ, samyagjñānavata eva tattvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:974: ata eva madanumāne ... {One line lost in the MS.} anyathā siddhasādhanatvādakāryatvaṃ copādhiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:976: upamānaṃ tu madīyā gauranena sadṛśīti gosadṛśagavayamālokayato 'numānameva /
GSP32vvmanmhu:977: kathamiti cet, bhavati hi pūrvaṃ gavi gavayasādṛśyamityanumitiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:980: athavā madīyā gauranena sadṛśī, svasādṛśyenaitadavacchedakatvād, bhrātṛbhaginīvat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:984_1: ca sādṛśyasyopalakṣaṇatve nirṇīte tadeva vākyaṃ gavayapadasya gavayatvanimittatvaṃ bodhayati /
GSP32vvmanmhu:994_0: pramāṇadvayavirodho 'pi sāvakāśānavakāśayoḥ sāvakāśasya viṣayasaṃkoca iti vyāptidarśanavato
GSP32vvmanmhu:996: vākyamantareṇa vākyānupapatterabhāvāt na hi pīno devadatto divā na bhuṃkte' iti vākyaṃ `rātrau bhuṃkte' iti vākyena vinānupapannam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:998: na hi pacatīti padaṃ pratyakṣādinā nirākāṃkṣamapi tu odanapadeneti cet,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1005: na ca so 'pyasti traikālikabhojananiṣedhe hi sa syāt, na hyabhuktvā pīnaḥ kṣaṇamapi tiṣṭhati /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1008: astu tarhi pacatītyatraivodanapadakalpanā śrutārthāpattiriti cet, tatrāpyarthasyaiva kalpanāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1014: na caivaṃ śabdavilopaprasaṅgaḥ, iṣṭatvāt, tasya vākyānumāne 'ntarbhāvo 'bhyadhāyi /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1017: na cendriyārthasambandhābhāvo bādhakaḥ, asambaddhasyāpi pratyakṣatve ko doṣaḥ?
GSP32vvmanmhu:1019: na ca tāvanmātrasya kāraṇatvamastīti vācyam, andhasyāpi śuklapaṭe pītatvābhāvapratītiprasaṅgāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1027: satyapi duḥkhe tadvyavahāradarśanāt --- santāpavataḥ śītahrade nimagnārdhakāyasya sukhyahamiti mateḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1052: na ca gurutvarasavattve upādhī, ghaṭe sādhyābhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1054: (3 snehaḥ--) udakaṃ guṇatvāvāntarajātyā svāśrayavyāvarttakaguṇāśrayaḥ, rasavatvāt, pṛthivīvat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1064: sa ca vegaḥ pratyakṣe dravye pratyakṣeṇaiva gṛhyate, vegena gacchatīti pratīteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1080: pratīyate ca kāmanāviṣayatvena sādhyatvaṃ svargasya, vidhibalādyāgasya sādhanatvenānuṣṭheyatvam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1081: na ca vācyaṃ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ kṣaṇikasya yāgasya kālāntarabhāvini svarge vināvāntaravyāpāraṃ upapadyate iti madhye 'pūrvasiddhiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1082: apare ca yāgasvargayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvo nāpūrvavākyātpratīyate, yogyatāvirahāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1086: kāmādhikāreṣu phalaṃ prati kāraṇasyaiva satastasya niyogaṃ prati viṣayatvābhyupagamāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1095: 1 śabdo guṇaḥ, bāhyendriyāṇāṃ madhye avayavyagrāhakeṇaiva gṛhyamāṇāyā jāteradhikaraṇatvādgandhavat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1100: 2 śabdo dravyaṃ sākṣādindriyasambandhena gṛhyamāṇatvādghaṭavaditi cet, na, vyarthaviśeṣaṇatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1103: svapadasya grāhyapadasya na vyāvartanamasti adravyasya bhavatāṃ naye sambandhānabhyupagamāt,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1108: 3 śabdo guṇo na bhavati, śrāvaṇatvāt, śabdatvavaditi cet, na, adravyatvena hyasya samānatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1111: ātmavyatiriktatve sati indriyāṇāṃ madhye nityenaivādhyakṣīkṛtāyā jāteradhikaraṇatvātsukhavat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1116: anitya śabdaḥ arasatve satyavayavyagrāhakeṇaiva gṛhyamāṇajāteradhikaraṇatvādgandhavaditi bhāṭṭaṃ prati /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1118: ātmaviśeṣaguṇānyatve sati indriyāṇāṃ madhye nityenaiva gṛhyamāṇatvāditi,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1120: sāmānyavattve satīti viśeṣaṇe 'pi tathā, paramate tatrāpi jāterabhyupagamāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1127: evaṃ vyavasthite pratyakṣeṇāpi sādhyate naṣṭaḥ śabda iti pratīteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1149: sati kalpakasya prāmāṇye 'vivādāttatsādhitamiti na yuktam, tadvādhitamityasyāpi vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1154: (1 sattā--) vivādapadaṃ dravyaṃ samānajātīyasamavāyikāraṇam, samavāyikāraṇatvāt, mṛdvat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1155: na ca sparśavattvamupādhiḥ, antyāvayavini tava vyabhicārāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1156: asmākaṃ tu vyāptikāle sattāpratipattau cānyatrāpi siddhiḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1162: samavāyikāraṇatvād ghaṭavat --- atra vipratipattiviṣayasyaiva tathāvidhatvānna sādhye viśeṣaṇopādānād dūṣaṇam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1187: (15 gandhatvam--) gandho rūpāvṛttijātimān, kevalanimittakāraṇatve sati rūpānyatvādghaṭavat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1213: vibhāgaḥ saṃyogāvṛttijātimān, saṃyogavyatiriktatve sati dvayāsamavāyikāraṇatvād dvitantukavat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1223: gomayajavṛścikaśarīrasantānavadityanumānenābrāhmaṇapūrvake kvacid brāhmaṇaśabde prāpte na brāhmaṇajanyaśarīranibandhano brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1255: ato na sādhyavikalatā tatra saṃyogasamavāyamātre viprattipattirna dharmiṇi /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1256: apare tu saṃyogaḥ svavyatiriktasambandhādbhinnaḥ, meyatvāditi bruvate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1261: bhedābhedanibandhanāsāviti cet, asti tāvadbhedaḥ sampratipanno ghaṭarūpayoḥ, abhedaḥ punaḥ kaḥ syāt?
GSP32vvmanmhu:1264: na dvitīyaḥ, āśrayakṛtaḥ svarūpakṛtaḥ kāryakṛto vā virodhaḥ syāt, sarvathā tadvirodhānuvṛtteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1265: dvitīye tu tadevāstu kimanena prathamena? tṛtīyaḥ, samavāyenānatirekānnāsti tatra vipratipattiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1270: svarūpaṃ bhedaścet, tarhi tatpratīteḥ pratiyogisāpekṣatvaṃ durghaṭam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1272: nāpi caramaḥ, tayorhi kāryaṃ pratipattiḥ syāt, tadvyatiriktaṃ vā kiñcit?
GSP32vvmanmhu:1274: prathame na kadācidapi tayoḥ pratipattiḥ syāt, sarvadā tadvirodhānuvṛtteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1275: dvitīye tu tāvadevāstu kimanena? tṛtīye savidāṃ janmaiva durghaṭam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1276: yadyasmādbhinnaśabdavācyam, tattadapekṣayā bhinnam, yathā ghaṭāpekṣayā ghaṭagataṃ rūpamiti /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1277: vivādādhyāsitāḥ śabdā ākāśasamavāyenaiva samavāyinaḥ, samavāyitvāt, śabdākāśavat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1278: na ca samavāyasyaikatve vastusaṅkaraprasaṅgaḥ, tasya samastaviśvāsaṃkaratvenaiva parikalpitatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1279: na hi tasyāpratyakṣasya pūrvaṃ svabhāvo nirdhāritaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1280: ekasya bhinnasvabhāvatve 'nya iti cet, na, citrarūpavattathāvidhasyaikasvabhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1290: yadi nāstīti pratyayavedyamāno 'pi tvayā neṣṭa iti vaktuṃ nocitam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1294: bhūtalamātravyavahārātiriktatve sati bhūtalavyavahāratvāditi mānaṃ bhūtalamiti vyavahāreṇānaikāntikam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1296: bhavati hi ghaṭatadrūpayoḥ sahopalambhe 'pi rūpaṃ ghaṭo na bhavatīti bhinnaścotpādavyavahāraḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1310: śaktirapi padārthāntaramastīti cet, na, tatsadbhāve pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1314: brīhīn prokṣatīti dvitīyāyāśca na tatsamavetasaṃskāravācakatvaṃ kriyājanyaphalabhāgitvaṃ ca na tatsamavāyinamākṣipati,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1316: anyathopayuktānāṃ prastarādīnāṃ homenotpādyamānaḥ saṃskāro na teṣāṃ syāt, teṣāṃ vinaṣṭatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1317: na ca tatra saṃskāryatvaṃ nāsti, ``bhūtabhāvyupayogaṃ ca dravyaṃ saṃskāramarhati'' iti nyāyāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1321: ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmītyatra prābhākarāṇāṃ naye jñānajanitaphalasya ghaṭe kasyacidabhāvāt tatra kathaṃ karmatvamiti cintyam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1322: ata eva bhāṭṭairjñātatā 'bhyupagamyate iti cet, teṣāmapyatītānāgateṣu kā vārttā?
GSP32vvmanmhu:1323: tatrāpi jāteranuvartamānatvādadoṣa iti cet, kathaṃ tarhi vyaktau jñātatvam?
GSP32vvmanmhu:1325: bhede 'pyadoṣa iti cet, na, rasanena rasajñānamātreṇaiva tadāśrayasyāpi jñātatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1327: jñātatānabhyupagamāt kathaṃ jñānasya viṣayaniyama iti cet, jñātatāyā eva kathamāśrayaniyamaḥ?
GSP32vvmanmhu:1330: etena viśiṣṭatāpi nirākṛtā, tadutpādakasāmagryā eva vijātīyajñānotpattāvapyupapatteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1336: etena viṣayībhāvarūpaḥ sambandho nirastaḥ, tanniyāmakenaiva jñānārthayorniyamopapatteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1338: (5 sādṛśyasya padārthāntaratvanirāsaḥ--) astu tarhi sādṛśyaṃ padārthāntaramiti cet, na, mānābhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1339: na ca vyavahāro mānam, tasya sāmānyādisambandhatvenāpyupapatteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1340: kathaṃ tarhi sāmānye sādṛśyavyavahāraḥ, kutaḥ śyenacitaṃ cinvīta (tai saṃ 5.4.11)
GSP32vvmanmhu:1344: (6 pradhānasya padārthāntaratvapratyākhyānam--) evaṃ pradhānādayo 'pi nirākāryāḥ, sādhakābhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1345: na ca vivādapadaṃ sākṣātparamparayā vā prakṛtijanyam, kāryatvādityavītamiti vācyam, vyaptyasiddheḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1346: na ca sukhaduḥkhamohāḥ kāraṇapūrvakāḥ, kāryatvāditi sāmpratam, saṃyogādiṣu vyabhicārāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1347: na ca sadutpattiparyālocanayā tatsiddhaḥ, tatraiva vivādāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1348: na ca tadarthamupādīyamānatvāt tatra sattvam, nimittakāraṇe vyabhicārāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1349: na ca sati kāraṇavyāpāraḥ asārthakatvāditi jātiniyamajñena vyavasthā ghaṭate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1350: yenaiva pramāṇena ghaṭabhāvasiddhistenaiva pramāṇena yogyānupalabdhyā paṭotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ tantuṣvapi paṭābhāvasiddhiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1355: kiṃ bahunā ``parasparavirodhe hi na prakārāntarasthitiḥ'' iti nyāyāt padārthāntarāṇāṃ na sambhavaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1359: tatra hi dravyādināṃ heyopādeyasvarūpeṇa jñāne sati saṃsārasya duḥkhabhūyastvaṃ paśyataḥ sukhamapi duḥkhānuṣaṅgādduḥkhapakṣe nikṣiptam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1360_0: upaniṣadā ca jñātajīvātmabrahmaṇo vaiśeṣikoktadṛśā bhagavadbhaktimanaskasya sadgurukaṭākṣapātakṣīṇāntarāyasya
GSP32vvmanmhu:1364: na hi siddhārthe kaścitprayatate iti bhavatāmapi avidyānivṛttireva kṛtisādhyā,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1367: ``ānandaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ tacca mokṣe 'bhivyajyate'' iti santoṣajasukhabhiprāyeṇa gauṇyā vṛttyā duḥkhābhāvābhiprāyeṇa vā kathaṃcidguṇavāda iti,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1368: ``aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ'' (chā u 8.12.1) iti vacanāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1369: na ca sāṃsārikasukhābhiprāyeṇa tat, sāṃsārikasukhasyāpi brahmasukhānatiriktatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1371: atra kecit-- duḥkhaparihārārthaṃ jñānasukhayoḥ pūrvaṃ viṣayaviṣayibhāvo 'nupapannaḥ paścādutpādya iti brūyuḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1380: na ca jīvā nityajñānā ātmavadīśvaravaditi sāmpratam, īśvarasvarūpasyaivopādheḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1385: sukhatvaṃ nityasamavetam, tajjātitvāditi tu tadgatanikarṣatvena vyabhicaratātyalamatiprasaṅgena /
